title: Sangria as nature intended
ingredients: ['1cm cubes any fruit available such as oranges, apples, pear, banana or even lemons.', '1 cinnamon stick', '2 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '1 shot Safari® liqueur', '1 shot Cointreau® liqueur', '1 shot brandy', '1 shot vodka', '1 shot Bacardi® rum', '1 shot Martini®', '400ml red wine', '500ml lemonade or 7Up®', 'ice', 'mint leaves']
